name: the white Lilly
description:
This game was made for the brackeys Game jam 2023.1

The theme was "the end is a new beginning".

It is a simple point and click which you can casually play with the mouse or here in the browser on mobile with your fingers ;-).

I would really have liked to add an endscreen :D but I did not have enough time ^^ Well The End of the Story is, you ship your game
